name: Adam Warlock

abilities.name: Soul Beam
abilities.details: Fires a beam that increases in damage the longer it hits a single target. Consumes energy.

abilities.name: Quantum Leap
abilities.details: Teleports forward instantly. Can store 2 charges.

abilities.name: Soul Cocoon
abilities.details: Throws a cocoon projectile at a downed ally. After a delay, the ally revives with partial health.

abilities.name: Metamorphosis
abilities.details: Briefly transforms, gaining damage reduction and healing over time.

ultimate.name: Karmic Blast
ultimate.effect: Deals damage and applies a 'Soul Curse' debuff (increased damage taken).
ultimate.details: Charges briefly then unleashes a powerful wave of cosmic energy.

passives.name: Cosmic Energy
passives.details: Manages the energy resource used by Soul Beam.

teamups.effect: Soul Curse inflicted by Karmic Blast deals increased damage.

lore: Artificially created to be the perfect being, Adam Warlock possesses vast cosmic powers derived from the Soul Gem (in some continuities) and his unique physiology. He often plays a pivotal role in cosmic events.
